about_the_game:
Manage 4 different characters simultaneously

Lead a group of four diverse survivors with different stats and abilities. Use their different strengths to build infrastructure, manage the cold weather and collect resources. Fight the merciless nature and various threats such as wild animals.

Weaken your opponents by using threats

Deploy threats on your opponents to weaken them. Your primary objective is to reach the chopper in the center of the map by completing the tunnel first!

Optimize your build order

Strategy is a core element of this top-down survival game: In order to be successful, you must optimize your build order. Timing with the changing weather, character micro and resource macro are key elements for success. Act wisely on a beautiful and symmetrically designed winter map.

Key features

  • Experience unique gameplay: Survival combined with real time strategy elements at its core: Top-down view, base building, resource collection
  • Lead four diverse survivors in each game. The survivors come with unique abilities, different stats and weapons.
  • Mange the hunger and coldness for each of your characters to keep them alive, while trying to build a tunnel to escape a hostile area
  • Challenge other players in this 1 vs 1 multiplayer game with your strategies and get placed on the leaderboard
  • Apply threats like blizzards, wolf packs, virus spreading and avalanches to weaken your opponent
  • Play on a symmetrically, beautifully designed winter map with a lot of details and strategic options
  • Deal with the changing weather

Support the development of this unique and new game idea and get the full Survive It: Frozen experience by purchasing the "Additional Characters Pack" on Steam. This DLC features four additional characters, allowing you to play the game with new character combinations and different build orders.

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoonish death animation with blood of characters and animals due to violence, illness, starving or coldness. Dead bodies and blood disappear after some seconds.

name: Survive It: Frozen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT540M or AMD Mobility Radeon HD 5650 or Intel HD 510 equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 2 GHz Quad Core processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT540M or AMD Mobility Radeon HD 5650 or Intel HD 510 equivalent
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Can you lead four different survivors despite threats in a hostile winter area? Join the strategic multiplayer challenge! Survive It: Frozen is a small indie game that comes with a new and unique gameplay concept combining survival and real time strategy.
